attributes.additional_details:
We consider the decision to deport ex-England international rugby union player Hendre Fourie to be unjust and lacking in gratitude. Hendre always paid his way in this country and was proud to play for his adopted country.

We call on HM Government  to allow Hendre Fourie to be allowed to stay in the UK for a further 2 years when he would be eligible for residency.
